title: Vampire Hunter D (2000) (Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust)
synopsis: The story revolves around D, the infamous "dhampir" (born of a vampire father and a human mother) outcast and renowned vampire hunter. His prowess at hunting the creatures of the night allowing his acceptance among humans, he is called upon to locate Charlotte Elbourne, the lovely daughter of an affluent family who has been mysteriously kidnapped.
voices: ['Tanaka, Hideyuki', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Nagai, Ichiro', 'Hayashibara, Megumi', 'Seki, Toshihiko', 'Fujiwara, Keiji', 'Maeda, Bibari', 'Shinohara, Emi', 'Soumi, Youko', 'Nishi, Rintarou']
